lead_paragraph: MALONE--Dr. Charles Anthony, child psychiatrist, teacher, mentor, colleague, leader, jazz-lover, Giants fan, rabble-rouser and advocate, adored son, beloved and loving husband, father/step- father, grandfather, in-law, uncle, cousin, and friend, died on April 24th, 'round midnight, having given his all to living. He was 88. A memorial service will be announced. In lieu of flowers, please consider donating to a candidate or cause of your choice, or, better still, get out and pound the pavement. He did. 1/3
